channel.title: Need to open .php files for something i made in my server
channel.description: Hi, i need to know how to open them, Ok, i got XAMPP and i turned on everything i could (mySql, Apache, and filezilla) its XAMPP Ctrl panel 2.5 Now what do i do? YES I KNOW HOW TO EDIT WITH NOTEPAD!!! I NEED TO OPEN IT UP ON INTERNET EXPLORER (like an html document)

item.title: Need to open .php files for something i made in my server
item.dc:creator: @pesterd pesterd
item.description:
@pesterd wrote:

close filezilla…
and btw you can right click open with press notepad++

Read full topic

item.title: Need to open .php files for something i made in my server
item.dc:creator: @ar-temi-s ar-temi-s
item.description:
@ar-temi-s wrote:

[quote=“tehlobbiescape, post:1, topic:283217”]Hi, i need to know how to open them,
Ok, i got XAMPP and i turned on everything i could (mySql, Apache, and filezilla) its XAMPP Ctrl panel 2.5
Now what do i do?
YES I KNOW HOW TO EDIT WITH NOTEPAD!!! I NEED TO OPEN IT UP ON INTERNET EXPLORER (like an html document)[/quote]

save it as a .php file in a Notepad like

File > Save as > Filename.php

Read full topic
